com.squareup.picasso

Interface Cache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LruCache

    public interface Cache
    A memory cache for storing the most recently used images.

    Note: The Cache is accessed by multiple threads. You must ensure your Cache implementation is thread safe when get(String) or set(String, android.graphics.Bitmap) is called.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Cache NONE
      A cache which does not store any values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the cache.
      void clearKeyUri(java.lang.String keyPrefix)
      Remove items whose key is prefixed with keyPrefix.
      android.graphics.Bitmap get(java.lang.String key)
      Retrieve an image for the specified key or null.
      int maxSize()
      Returns the maximum size in bytes that the cache can hold.
      void set(java.lang.String key, android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
      Store an image in the cache for the specified key.
      int size()
      Returns the current size of the cache in bytes.
